identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a modern, colorful, and efficient ERP for a milk collection center that bridges agriculture and technology.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix agricultural warmth with fintech precision.
Emotion First: Trust, Cleanliness, and Efficiency.
Content is King: Data legibility is paramount.
Zoom In: Focus on key metrics (Fat %, Quantity).
Negative Space: Breathable layouts for high-density data.
Contrast: High contrast for readability in bright environments (field use).

rtl_strategy.direction: dir='rtl' for Arabic, dir='ltr' for English
rtl_strategy.spacing: Use logical properties: ms-*, me-*, ps-*, pe-*, start-*, end-*
rtl_strategy.mirroring: Ensure icons (arrows, chevrons) flip in RTL. Use 'transform rtl:rotate-180' where necessary.

cards.header: flex flex-row items-center justify-between space-y-0 pb-2

buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 shadow-sm rounded-lg px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-colors

login_hero.alt: Cows grazing in a green pasture

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text contrast ratio is at least 4.5:1 against background.
accessibility.aria_labels: All interactive elements must have aria-labels, especially icon-only buttons.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Cairo' font for Arabic support and 'Inter' for English.
Ensure all layouts are RTL-compatible using Tailwind logical properties (ms-*, me-*, start-*, end-*).
Create a 'LanguageSwitcher' component that toggles the 'dir' attribute on the HTML tag.
Use the provided image URLs for the login page and dashboard widgets.
Follow the 'Bento' grid layout for the main dashboard.
Use Shadcn UI components as the base but customize them with the defined border radii and shadows.
Implement a 'RoleBasedRoute' component to handle Admin, Employee, and Accountant access.
Use 'recharts' for data visualization (Milk Quantity, Fat/Protein Trends).
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Do not apply universal transitions (transition: all).
Do not center align the app container.
Use modern button styles (pill-shaped or sharp with animations).
Never use AI assistant emoji characters.
Use generous spacing (2-3x more than typical).
Use subtle grain textures or noise overlays if possible.
Use named exports for components and default exports for pages.
